kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

test.name: TC03 - Form validation to ensure it is properly filled

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.' into text field '//form/div/textarea[@placeholder='If you don’t mind sharing, which other trading platforms do you use?']'.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains element '//p[contains(.,'Please select at least one reason')]'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element '//form/label/span[contains(@class,'dc-checkbox__label') and contains(.,'The platforms aren’t user-friendly.')]'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.arg: //form/label/span[contains(@class,'dc-checkbox__label') and contains(.,'I prefer another trading website.')]
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element '//form/label/span[contains(@class,'dc-checkbox__label') and contains(.,'I prefer another trading website.')]'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.arg: //form/label/span[contains(@class,'dc-checkbox__label') and contains(.,'The platforms lack key features or functionality.')]
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element '//form/label/span[contains(@class,'dc-checkbox__label') and contains(.,'The platforms lack key features or functionality.')]'.

kw.name: Page Should Not Contain
kw.doc: Verifies the current page does not contain ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page does not contain text '//p[contains(.,'Please select at least one reason')]'.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Sending key(s) ('CTRL+A+DEL',) to //form/div/textarea[@placeholder='If you don’t mind sharing, which other trading platforms do you use?'] element.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.
